jsky.coords
Class Trigod

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jsky.coords.Trigod
public class Trigod
extends java.lang.Object

Trigonometric Function in degrees.

This class is based on C routintes by Francois Ochsenbein [ESO-IPG].
